name: Chasing Shadow
description:
Olaf has been separated from his shadow, and it's up to you to get back together.

The game is made by Stian Hegerland Hagen and Hilde Merete F. Slette as part of the course TPD4168 - Game Design at Norwegian University of Science and Technology.

Music by Bjon12345abc, Source:

http://opengameart.org/content/the-cave-of-ancient...
